pages.text: $(l)Leviathan Axe$() is a legendary weapon of immense power, forged by the masterful hands of the Huldra brothers, $(l)Brok and Sindri$(). $(br2)Crafted to counter the might of Thor’s $(l:relics/mjolnir)Mjölnir$(), this axe was bestowed upon Kratos by his beloved wife, Laufey. $(br2)$(l)Abilities:$()$(li)$(l)Cryokinesis:$() The Leviathan Axe harnesses the power of ice, allowing its wielder to freeze enemies and unleash devastating frost attacks.$(li)$(l)Weapon Throwing:$() The axe can be hurled at enemies with great force, dealing significant damage from a distance.$(li)$(l)Weapon Summoning:$() With a mere thought, the axe returns to its master’s hand.$(li)$(l)Extended Freeze:$() Each strike of the axe increases the duration of the freezing effect on enemies, rendering them immobile for longer periods.$(li)$(l)Loyalty:$() The axe is loyal to its master, ensuring that no other warrior can lift it from the ground.

pages.title: Levithan Handle
pages.text: Obtaining this weapon involves both crafting and trading. $(br2)Firstly, one must craft the $(l)Levithan Handle$().

pages.title: Levithan Head
pages.text: Secondly, one will also need to craft the $(l)Levithan Head$().

pages.title: Frozen Flame
pages.text: Thirdly, one must obtain the $(l)Frozen Flame$(), the embodiment of icy fury, which can be purchased from $(l:entities/huldra_brothers)Brok and Sindri$().
Finally, to create the legendary $(l)Leviathan Axe$(), one must combine all three ingredients together.
